classes.cCustomNote: Choose one of the following: PHIL230, or PHIL231.
Choose one of the following: PHIL323, PHIL327, PHIL328, PHIL329, or PHIL340.

Any Approved Elective (CSC, EE, Math, or Science) course can go here. Consultation with an advisor is recommended prior to selecting approved electives; bear in mind your selections may impact the pursuit of post-baccalaureate students and/or goals. No double-counting with other degree requirements.

One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B2, C1, Lower-Division C Elective, D1, Area D Elective, E, F. Upper-Division C should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to the online catalog for GE course selection, United States Cultural Pluralism (USCP), and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR). The USCP requirement can be satisfied by some (but not all) courses within GE categories: C1, Upper-Division C, D1, D2, Upper-Division D, or E.
